nouns.description: netball (countable and uncountable, plural netballs) (ball games)

entries.meaning: (uncountable) A (usually women's) team sport derived from basketball, with seven players on each side who attempt to score goals by passing a ball and throwing it into the opponent's goal, which is a raised hoop with a net at one end of the playing area. Unlike basketball, a player in possession of the ball cannot move until the ball is passed to another player.
(countable) The ball used in this sport.
